The 51-year-old Mike Pence made multiple trips to states that host early presidential primary contests, fueling some speculation he might seek the White House instead. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters.`` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''
